verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H561>words,<s%> and <S%H6845>hide<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee;
So that thou <S%H7181>incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H5186>apply<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H8394>understanding;<s%>
Yea, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou <S%H7121>criest<s%> after <S%H998>knowledge,<s%> and liftest <S%H5414>up<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> for <S%H8394>understanding;<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H1245>seekest<s%> her as <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H2664>searchest<s%> for her as for hid <S%H4301>treasures;<s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> shalt thou <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom:<s%> out of his <S%H4480>mouth<s%> <S%H6310><s%> cometh <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
He layeth <S%H6845>up<s%> sound <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> for the <S%H3477>righteous:<s%> he is a <S%H4043>buckler<s%> to them that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8537>uprightly.<s%>
He <S%H5341>keepeth<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H8104>preserveth<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints.<s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> shalt thou <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H4339>equity;<s%> yea, <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4570>path.<s%>
When <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H935>entereth<s%> into thine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is <S%H5276>pleasant<s%> unto thy <S%H5315>soul;<s%>
Discretion <S%H4209><s%> shall <S%H8104>preserve<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, <S%H8394>understanding<s%> shall <S%H5341>keep<s%> thee:
To <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee from the <S%H4480>way<s%> <S%H1870><s%> of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> man, from the <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> that <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> froward <S%H8419>things;<s%>
Who <S%H5800>leave<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H3476>uprightness,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness;<s%>
Who <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and delight <S%H1523>in<s%> the <S%H8419>frowardness<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked;<s%>
Whose <S%H834><s%> <S%H734>ways<s%> are <S%H6141>crooked,<s%> and they <S%H3868>froward<s%> in their paths: <S%H4570><s%>

To <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee from the strange <S%H4480>woman,<s%> <S%H802><s%> <S%H2114><s%> even from the <S%H4480>stranger<s%> <S%H5237><s%> which <S%H2505>flattereth<s%> with her <S%H561>words;<s%>
Which <S%H5800>forsaketh<s%> the <S%H441>guide<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> and <S%H7911>forgetteth<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of her <S%H430>God.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> her <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7743>inclineth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4194>death,<s%> and her <S%H4570>paths<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H7496>dead.<s%>
None <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that go <S%H935>unto<s%> her return <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> take they <S%H5381>hold<s%> of the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>
That <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> men, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall dwell <S%H7931>in<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and the <S%H8549>perfect<s%> shall <S%H3498>remain<s%> in it.
But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H4480>earth,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and the <S%H898>transgressors<s%> shall be <S%H5255>rooted<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> it.
